title: Random Boolean Value
description: In this lab, we will be exploring JavaScript programming by working on various exercises and challenges. Through this lab, you will have the opportunity to apply your knowledge of JavaScript by completing different tasks that will test your understanding of different concepts such as loops, arrays, functions, and more. By the end of the lab, you will have gained a deeper understanding of JavaScript programming and be better equipped to tackle more complex problems in the future.

meta.title: Mastering Random Boolean Values in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore JavaScript programming through hands-on exercises and challenges, including generating random boolean values.
meta.keywords: javascript, coding exercises, javascript practice, javascript practice online, tutorials, javascript lab, javascript tutor, programming, random boolean

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 随机布尔值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将通过完成各种练习和挑战来探索JavaScript编程。通过这个实验，你将有机会通过完成不同的任务来应用你对JavaScript的知识，这些任务将测试你对不同概念的理解，如循环、数组、函数等等。在实验结束时，你将对JavaScript编程有更深入的理解，并更好地准备好应对未来更复杂的问题。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的随机布尔值
meta.description: 通过实践练习和挑战探索JavaScript编程，包括生成随机布尔值。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 编码练习, JavaScript实践, 在线JavaScript实践, 教程, JavaScript实验, JavaScript导师, 编程, 随机布尔值

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，通过输入'node'并按下回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
